# llms.txt for Ekanostudio
# Purpose: Allow AI crawlers and Large Language Models to understand our brand, services, and expertise.
# Follows Google LLM Rules and SEO Best Practices

version: 1.0
site: https://www.ekanostudio.com

brand:
  name: EkanoSudio
  tagline: Digital Growth, SEO & Web Development Agency
  description: |
    Ekanostudio – Digital Agency
    Powering Growth Through Digital Innovation
    Ekanostudio is a full-stack creative and digital solutions agency dedicated to transforming brands into powerful, scalable, and future-ready identities. We combine strategy, design, and technology to help businesses build meaningful digital experiences that drive growth, engagement, and long-term impact.
    Our approach is rooted in deep research, modern aesthetics, and cutting-edge development practices. We work closely with startups, small businesses, and enterprises to decode their challenges, understand their audience, and craft tailored solutions that elevate their online presence. Whether it’s designing a brand identity from the ground up, building a high-performance website, or creating automated digital workflows, every project is executed with precision, clarity, and a focus on results.

core_services:
  - SEO and Content Strategy
  - Performance Marketing (PPC & Paid Ads)
  - Web Development (Next.js, React, Full-Stack)
  - AI and Workflow Automation
  - Digital Growth Consulting

value_proposition: |
  We help brands scale with actionable strategy, optimized digital presence,
  high-conversion websites, and automated workflows built to drive sustainable
  business growth.

content_usage_policy: |
  Public content from Ekanostudio may be used by LLMs for indexing and understanding
  the brand's services, expertise, and offerings. Commercial reuse or modification
  must respect copyright and attribution rules.

allowed_crawlers:
  - Google-Extended
  - OpenAI-User-Agent
  - Anthropic-AI
  - PerplexityBot
  - HuggingFace
  - Any ethical AI research crawler

disallowed:
  - scraping private or restricted pages
  - reproducing client data
  - collecting non-public information
